TEXT.TITLE: BRITTON LEE <BLII> SEES FIRST QUARTER LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Britton Lee Inc said it expects to report a loss on lower sales than it had anticipated for the first quarter. The company earned 119,000 dlrs before a 70,000 dlr tax credit on sales of 7,227,000 dlrs in the year-ago period.
